long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your Ultimate Companion for Effortless Code and Style Extraction!

Unleash the power of Styles.Zone, a sleek Chrome extension designed to revolutionize your web development workflow. Whether you're a seasoned developer or just starting, this tool is your go-to solution for extracting code and styles from any webpage with ease.

Inline & Tailwind Support: Seamlessly extract inline styles and effortlessly integrate Tailwind CSS into your projects.
Clean and Readable Output: Enjoy well-organized and formatted code snippets for a smoother development experience.
User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive design ensures that even beginners can navigate the extension effortlessly.
Time-Saving Functionality: Say goodbye to manual code extraction â€“ boost your productivity with just a few clicks.
